info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:24PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with Heavy Rain near Fallon, Yerington, and Schurz through 330 PM PDT... At 220 PM PDT, meteorologists were tracking showers and thunderstorms with heavy rainfall between Yerington, Fallon, and Schurz. These storms were moving to the north at 20 to 30 MPH but were training over the same areas. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall with rates up to 1 inch per hour, gusty winds to 30 mph, and lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding of low spots and poor drainage areas around Fallon, Yerington, and Schurz is possible. This impacts Highways 95 and 50 as well. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Stillwater, Yerington, and Schurz. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Remember to slow down and turn on your headlights in heavy rain.
